column4: Syria -- don't worry about checking again. It's not true. You can run LAMP on a 64-bit system. I'm doing so right now.
But I have downloaded mysql5, mysql-server, apache2 and phpmyadmin why 127.0.0.1/phpmyadmin is still not found?
You've configured something incorrectly. It has nothing to do with your system being 64-bit.
